item.title: [Help] Spawn A New Npc When 1 Npc Dies
item.dc:creator: @killer75230 killer75230
item.description:
@killer75230 wrote:

o b b y , here dude use this

[code]

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == ###) {
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];

                            ppl.sendMessage("");
                            ppl.SummonNewNPC(###);
                                     }[/code]

thanks n0va ur kick , rep++

item.title: [Help] Spawn A New Npc When 1 Npc Dies
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

[quote=“n0va k0, post:15, topic:194160”]eh, add my public void in client.java under runnable then

Go to npchandler.java then search for

client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];

or

client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];

Under it add something like this. It may not be ppl. It may be p. instead

[code]}
if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == ###) {
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];

                            ppl.sendMessage("");
                            ppl.SummonNewNPC(###);[/code][/quote]

Read full topic
